can't find the place where the SKIDROW saves are plz help

@ Sky_block:
The path of the saved games of Skidrow releases is this: 

X:Users-YOUR USER NAME-AppDataLocalSKIDROW

(where "X" is the drive of your windows installation)

Make sure that you have all your folders/files visible (done via Folder Options/View) as the AppData folder may be hidden. Also if you have installed many Skidrow games you may find many sub-folders in your ...LocalSKIDROW  folder. If this is the case just check to see which sub-folder is related to the Kindgoms Of Amalur.

Hope this helps...
